html.div:
This dashboard shows the overall status of an environment utilizing the clustering feature of Splunk versions 5.x and higher. It indicates the amount of data which is indexed directly by the receiving indexer, and the amount of disk space taken up by replication copies of that data.
Note: Environments not making use of clustering will simply not have any replicated data shown on the graphs.
The panel titled Proportion of Replicated Data breaks out its display by indexer. This can highlight indexers which are disproportionately loaded.

single.title: Locally Indexed Data
single.searchString: `_fb_summary_recs(*)` | extract auto=f fb_extract_bucket_type_time_source | extract auto=f fb_extract_hot_bucket | search bucket_type!="rb" | stats max(sizeOnDiskMB) AS sizeOnDiskMB by path | stats sum(sizeOnDiskMB) AS indexed | `_fb_mbytes_pretty(indexed)`

single.title: Replicated Data
single.searchString: `_fb_summary_recs(*)` | extract auto=f fb_extract_bucket_type_time_source | extract auto=f fb_extract_hot_bucket | search bucket_type="rb" | stats max(sizeOnDiskMB) AS sizeOnDiskMB by path | stats sum(sizeOnDiskMB) AS replicated | `_fb_mbytes_pretty(replicated)`

single.title: Total (Local + Replicated)
single.searchString: `_fb_summary_recs(*)` | stats max(sizeOnDiskMB) AS sizeOnDiskMB by path | stats sum(sizeOnDiskMB) AS Total | `_fb_mbytes_pretty(Total)`

chart.title: Proportion of Replicated Data
chart.searchString: `_fb_summary_recs(*)` | extract auto=f fb_extract_bucket_type_time_source | extract auto=f fb_extract_hot_bucket | stats max(sizeOnDiskMB) AS sizeOnDiskMB by host, path, bucket_type, | eval bucket_type=if(bucket_type=="rb", "Replicated", "Indexed") | stats sum(sizeOnDiskMB) AS sizeOnDiskMB by host, bucket_type | chart sum(sizeOnDiskMB) AS "Disk Usage" OVER host by bucket_type

chart.title: Local vs. Replicated Data Over Time (last 30 days)
chart.searchString: `_fb_summary_recs(*)` | extract auto=f fb_extract_bucket_type_time_source | extract auto=f fb_extract_hot_bucket | bucket _time span=1d | stats max(sizeOnDiskMB) AS sizeOnDiskMB by _time, path, bucket_type | eval bucket_type=if(bucket_type=="rb", "Replicated", "Indexed") | timechart span=1d sum(sizeOnDiskMB) AS "Disk Usage" by bucket_type
